title: Graham-Taylor: Equities underperform when more easing announced
itunes:title: Graham-Taylor: Equities underperform when more easing announced
description:
Rabobank's Lyn Graham-Taylor discusses negative rates and its effect on the banking sector on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
